critique: The document is a presidential order regarding the transfer of control of certain piers from the Shipping Board to the War Department. It outlines the legal basis for the transfer, the reasons for the transfer (use by the Panama Railroad Steamship Line and the American Army of Occupation), and the duration of the transfer. There is no explicit discussion of immigration, social issues, or ideological positions. The order seems to prioritize executive power and federal control in managing government assets during a specific period following World War I.
